verses.text: \w When|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w* \w of|strong="G2250"\w* \w Pentecost|strong="G4005"\w* \f + \fr 2:1 \ft That is, Shavuot, the late spring feast of pilgrimage to Jerusalem; it is also known as the Feast of Harvest (see Exodus 23:16) or the Feast of Weeks (see Exodus 34:22).\f* \w came|strong="G2532"\w*, \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w were|strong="G1510"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w together|strong="G3674"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w one|strong="G3956"\w* \w place|strong="G1722"\w*.

Suddenly \w a|strong="G1096"\w* \w sound|strong="G2279"\w* \w like|strong="G5618"\w* \w a|strong="G1096"\w* \w mighty|strong="G2532"\w* \w rushing|strong="G5342"\w* \w wind|strong="G4157"\w* \w came|strong="G1096"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w filled|strong="G4137"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w whole|strong="G3650"\w* \w house|strong="G3624"\w* \w where|strong="G3757"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w were|strong="G1510"\w* \w sitting|strong="G2521"\w*.

\w They|strong="G2532"\w* \w saw|strong="G3708"\w* \w tongues|strong="G1100"\w* \w like|strong="G5616"\w* flames \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w fire|strong="G4442"\w* \w that|strong="G2532"\w* separated \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w came|strong="G2532"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* rest \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w each|strong="G1538"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w them|strong="G3708"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w were|strong="G3588"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w filled|strong="G4130"\w* \w with|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Holy|strong="G4151"\w* \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* began \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w speak|strong="G2980"\w* \w in|strong="G2532"\w* \w other|strong="G2087"\w* \w tongues|strong="G1100"\w* \w as|strong="G2531"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w* \w enabled|strong="G1325"\w* \w them|strong="G3588"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* \w there|strong="G1161"\w* \w were|strong="G1510"\w* \w dwelling|strong="G2730"\w* \f + \fr 2:5 \ft Or staying; similarly in verse 14\f* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2419"\w* God-fearing \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w* \w from|strong="G5259"\w* \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w nation|strong="G1484"\w* \w under|strong="G5259"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w when|strong="G1161"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w sound|strong="G5456"\w* rang \w out|strong="G2532"\w*, \w a|strong="G1096"\w* \w crowd|strong="G4128"\w* \w came|strong="G1096"\w* \w together|strong="G4905"\w* \w in|strong="G2532"\w* bewilderment, \w because|strong="G3754"\w* \w each|strong="G1538"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* heard \w them|strong="G3588"\w* \w speaking|strong="G2980"\w* \w his|strong="G2398"\w* \w own|strong="G2398"\w* \w language|strong="G1258"\w*.

\w Astounded|strong="G1839"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w amazed|strong="G2296"\w*, \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w asked|strong="G3004"\w*, “\w Are|strong="G1510"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w these|strong="G3778"\w* \w men|strong="G3956"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w speaking|strong="G2980"\w* \w Galileans|strong="G1057"\w*?

\w How|strong="G4459"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w it|strong="G2532"\w* \w then|strong="G2532"\w* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* \w each|strong="G1538"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w us|strong="G2249"\w* hears \w them|strong="G3588"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w his|strong="G1722"\w* \w own|strong="G2398"\w* \w native|strong="G1722"\w* \w language|strong="G1258"\w*?

\w Parthians|strong="G3934"\w*, \w Medes|strong="G3370"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Elamites|strong="G1639"\w*; \w residents|strong="G2730"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w Mesopotamia|strong="G3318"\w*, \w Judea|strong="G2449"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Cappadocia|strong="G2587"\w*, \w Pontus|strong="G4195"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Asia|strong="G3588"\w*,\f + \fr 2:9 \ft That is, the Roman Province of Asia, located in what is now western Turkey\f*

\w Phrygia|strong="G5435"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Pamphylia|strong="G3828"\w*, Egypt \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w parts|strong="G3313"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w Libya|strong="G3033"\w* \w near|strong="G2596"\w* \w Cyrene|strong="G2957"\w*; \w visitors|strong="G1927"\w* \w from|strong="G2532"\w* \w Rome|strong="G4514"\w*,

\w both|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jews|strong="G2453"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* converts \w to|strong="G2532"\w* Judaism; \w Cretans|strong="G2912"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* Arabs—\w we|strong="G2532"\w* hear \w them|strong="G3588"\w* declaring \w the|strong="G2532"\w* wonders \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w in|strong="G2532"\w* \w our|strong="G2316"\w* own \w tongues|strong="G1100"\w*!”

\w Astounded|strong="G1839"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w perplexed|strong="G1280"\w*, \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w asked|strong="G3004"\w* \w one|strong="G3956"\w* \w another|strong="G1161"\w*, “\w What|strong="G5101"\w* \w does|strong="G1510"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w mean|strong="G3004"\w*?”

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w others|strong="G2087"\w* \w mocked|strong="G5512"\w* \w them|strong="G3004"\w* \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w said|strong="G3004"\w*, “\w They|strong="G1161"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w drunk|strong="G3325"\w* \w on|strong="G1161"\w* new \w wine|strong="G1098"\w*!” Peter Addresses the Crowd (Psalms 16:1–11; Joel 2:28–32)

\w Then|strong="G2532"\w* \w Peter|strong="G4074"\w* \w stood|strong="G2476"\w* \w up|strong="G1869"\w* \w with|strong="G4862"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Eleven|strong="G1733"\w*, \w lifted|strong="G1869"\w* \w up|strong="G1869"\w* \w his|strong="G3956"\w* \w voice|strong="G5456"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* addressed \w the|strong="G2532"\w* crowd: “\w Men|strong="G3956"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w Judea|strong="G2453"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w dwell|strong="G2730"\w* \w in|strong="G2532"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="G2419"\w*, \w let|strong="G1161"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w known|strong="G1110"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* listen carefully \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w my|strong="G3956"\w* \w words|strong="G4487"\w*.

\w These|strong="G3778"\w* \w men|strong="G3778"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w drunk|strong="G3184"\w*, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w suppose|strong="G5274"\w*. \w It|strong="G1063"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w only|strong="G3756"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w third|strong="G5154"\w* \w hour|strong="G5610"\w* \w of|strong="G2250"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w*!\f + \fr 2:15 \ft That is, nine in the morning\f*

\w No|strong="G3588"\w*, \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w what|strong="G3588"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w spoken|strong="G3004"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w the|strong="G1223"\w* \w prophet|strong="G4396"\w* \w Joel|strong="G2493"\w*:

‘\w In|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w last|strong="G2078"\w* \w days|strong="G2250"\w*, \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w says|strong="G3004"\w*, \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w will|strong="G2316"\w* \w pour|strong="G1632"\w* \w out|strong="G1632"\w* \w My|strong="G3708"\w* \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w people|strong="G3956"\w*. \w Your|strong="G2532"\w* \w sons|strong="G5207"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w daughters|strong="G2364"\w* \w will|strong="G2316"\w* \w prophesy|strong="G4395"\w*, \w your|strong="G2532"\w* \w young|strong="G3495"\w* \w men|strong="G3956"\w* \w will|strong="G2316"\w* \w see|strong="G3708"\w* \w visions|strong="G3706"\w*, \w your|strong="G2532"\w* \w old|strong="G4245"\w* \w men|strong="G3956"\w* \w will|strong="G2316"\w* \w dream|strong="G1797"\w* \w dreams|strong="G1798"\w*.

\w Even|strong="G2532"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w My|strong="G1722"\w* menservants \w and|strong="G2532"\w* maidservants \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w will|strong="G2532"\w* \w pour|strong="G1632"\w* \w out|strong="G1632"\w* \w My|strong="G1722"\w* \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w those|strong="G3588"\w* \w days|strong="G2250"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w they|strong="G2532"\w* \w will|strong="G2532"\w* \w prophesy|strong="G4395"\w*.

\w I|strong="G2532"\w* \w will|strong="G2532"\w* \w show|strong="G1325"\w* \w wonders|strong="G5059"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w heavens|strong="G3772"\w* \w above|strong="G1909"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w signs|strong="G4592"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w earth|strong="G1093"\w* \w below|strong="G2736"\w*, blood \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w fire|strong="G4442"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* billows \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w smoke|strong="G2586"\w*.

\w The|strong="G2532"\w* \w sun|strong="G2246"\w* \w will|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G2532"\w* \w turned|strong="G3344"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w darkness|strong="G4655"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w moon|strong="G4582"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* blood, \w before|strong="G4250"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w coming|strong="G2064"\w* \w of|strong="G2250"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w great|strong="G3173"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w glorious|strong="G2016"\w* \w Day|strong="G2250"\w* \w of|strong="G2250"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w everyone|strong="G3956"\w* \w who|strong="G3739"\w* \w calls|strong="G1941"\w* \w on|strong="G1941"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w name|strong="G3686"\w* \w of|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w will|strong="G1510"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w saved|strong="G4982"\w*.’\f + \fr 2:21 \ft Joel 2:28–32 (see also LXX)\f*

\w Men|strong="G3778"\w* \w of|strong="G3056"\w* \w Israel|strong="G2475"\w*, \w listen|strong="G1492"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w message|strong="G3056"\w*: \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w of|strong="G3056"\w* \w Nazareth|strong="G3480"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w man|strong="G3778"\w* certified \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w miracles|strong="G1411"\w*, \w wonders|strong="G5059"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w signs|strong="G4592"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w did|strong="G4160"\w* \w among|strong="G1722"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w through|strong="G1223"\w* \w Him|strong="G3588"\w*, \w as|strong="G2531"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w yourselves|strong="G4771"\w* \w know|strong="G1492"\w*.

\w He|strong="G2532"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w delivered|strong="G1560"\w* \w up|strong="G2532"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*’s \w set|strong="G2532"\w* \w plan|strong="G1012"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w foreknowledge|strong="G4268"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w you|strong="G2532"\w*, \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w hands|strong="G5495"\w* \w of|strong="G1223"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* lawless, \w put|strong="G2532"\w* \w Him|strong="G3588"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* death \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w nailing|strong="G4362"\w* \w Him|strong="G3588"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w cross|strong="G4362"\w*.

\w But|strong="G2316"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w raised|strong="G2316"\w* \w Him|strong="G3588"\w* \w from|strong="G5259"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* dead, releasing \w Him|strong="G3588"\w* \w from|strong="G5259"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w agony|strong="G5604"\w* \w of|strong="G5259"\w* \w death|strong="G2288"\w*, \w because|strong="G2530"\w* \w it|strong="G3739"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w impossible|strong="G3756"\w* \w for|strong="G2316"\w* \w Him|strong="G3588"\w* \w to|strong="G3756"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w held|strong="G2902"\w* \w in|strong="G2316"\w* \w its|strong="G5259"\w* clutches.

\w David|strong="G1138"\w* \w says|strong="G3004"\w* \w about|strong="G1519"\w* \w Him|strong="G3588"\w*: ‘\w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w saw|strong="G4308"\w* \f + \fr 2:25 \ft Literally I foresaw; see verse 31.\f* \w the|strong="G1519"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w always|strong="G3956"\w* \w before|strong="G1799"\w* \w me|strong="G1473"\w*; \w because|strong="G3754"\w* \w He|strong="G3754"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w at|strong="G1519"\w* \w my|strong="G3956"\w* \w right|strong="G1188"\w* \w hand|strong="G1188"\w*, \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w will|strong="G1510"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w shaken|strong="G4531"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="G1223"\w* \w my|strong="G1473"\w* \w heart|strong="G2588"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w glad|strong="G2165"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w my|strong="G1473"\w* \w tongue|strong="G1100"\w* rejoices; \w my|strong="G1473"\w* \w body|strong="G4561"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w will|strong="G2532"\w* \w dwell|strong="G1909"\w* \w in|strong="G1909"\w* \w hope|strong="G1680"\w*,

\w because|strong="G3754"\w* \w You|strong="G4771"\w* \w will|strong="G1473"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w abandon|strong="G1459"\w* \w my|strong="G3708"\w* \w soul|strong="G5590"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* Hades, \w nor|strong="G3761"\w* \w will|strong="G1473"\w* \w You|strong="G4771"\w* let \w Your|strong="G3708"\w* \w Holy|strong="G3741"\w* \w One|strong="G3588"\w* \w see|strong="G3708"\w* \w decay|strong="G1312"\w*.

\w You|strong="G4771"\w* \w have|strong="G1473"\w* \w made|strong="G1107"\w* \w known|strong="G1107"\w* \w to|strong="G3326"\w* \w me|strong="G1473"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w paths|strong="G3598"\w* \w of|strong="G3598"\w* \w life|strong="G2222"\w*; \w You|strong="G4771"\w* \w will|strong="G1473"\w* \w fill|strong="G4137"\w* \w me|strong="G1473"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w joy|strong="G2167"\w* \w in|strong="G3326"\w* \w Your|strong="G3588"\w* \w presence|strong="G4383"\w*.’\f + \fr 2:28 \ft Psalms 16:8–11 (see also LXX)\f*

Brothers, \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w can|strong="G3004"\w* \w tell|strong="G3004"\w* \w you|strong="G5210"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w confidence|strong="G3954"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w the|strong="G1722"\w* \w patriarch|strong="G3966"\w* \w David|strong="G1138"\w* \w died|strong="G5053"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* \w buried|strong="G2290"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w his|strong="G4012"\w* \w tomb|strong="G3418"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w us|strong="G3004"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w*.

\w But|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G2532"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w a|strong="G2532"\w* \w prophet|strong="G4396"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w knew|strong="G1492"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w had|strong="G2532"\w* promised \w him|strong="G3588"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w oath|strong="G3727"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w He|strong="G2532"\w* \w would|strong="G2316"\w* \w place|strong="G1909"\w* \w one|strong="G3588"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w his|strong="G1909"\w* \w descendants|strong="G2590"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w his|strong="G1909"\w* \w throne|strong="G2362"\w*.\f + \fr 2:30 \ft Literally on oath that He would place out of the fruit of his loins on his throne; BYZ and TR on oath out of the fruit of his loins, according to the flesh, to raise up Christ to sit on his throne; Psalms 132:11\f*

Foreseeing \w this|strong="G3588"\w*, David \w spoke|strong="G2980"\w* \w about|strong="G4012"\w* \w the|strong="G1519"\w* resurrection \w of|strong="G4012"\w* \w the|strong="G1519"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w He|strong="G3754"\w* \w was|strong="G3588"\w* \w not|strong="G3777"\w* \w abandoned|strong="G1459"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* Hades, \w nor|strong="G3777"\w* \w did|strong="G3708"\w* \w His|strong="G1519"\w* \w body|strong="G4561"\w* \w see|strong="G3708"\w* \w decay|strong="G1312"\w*.

\w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w has|strong="G2316"\w* \w raised|strong="G2316"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w to|strong="G2316"\w* life, \w to|strong="G2316"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w witnesses|strong="G3144"\w*.
